items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Corruption is purged, not cleansed.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: We are but dogs, howling at an uncaring moon.

explicitMods:
Rare Monsters drop an additional Reward Type
Area has 2 additional random Modifiers
100% increased Experience Gain
Monster Level: 81
items.descrText: Travel to Esh's Domain by using this item in a personal Map Device. Can only be used once.

explicitMods: Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Young Tsarsk, you were a broken and forgotten child lying glassy-eyed
in a flesh-pit in Trarthus, but the Order found and cleansed you.

explicitMods: Area contains Metamorph Monsters
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Rejected even by the Faridun outcasts, young Saresh, you were cursed to walk the
white sands until we found you. The Order shall command your penance now.

explicitMods: Area contains 3 additional Strongboxes
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your outlaw camp abandoned you when their surprise attack failed, young Rindwik.
Now that you know we exist, we cannot let you go. You have two choices.

explicitMods:
Area contains a Blight Encounter
Blight Encounters contain an additional Blight Boss
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For using the techniques of your homeland to contain
the fungal plague, honoured Dhunan, you shall lead the war
to eliminate it and end the century-cycle of infestation.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains 2 additional Red Beasts
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: None among us understand the beasts of this world better than you,
honoured Agnar. You will root out the mysteries of wild-artefacts.

items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.

explicitMods: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your faith and our Order are not in opposition, young Eutychus.
Let this be the start of a new era of cooperation.

explicitMods: 35% increased Maps found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For your loyalty and valour, honoured Betucia, we are proud to put
the requisition of dream-artefacts in your capable hands.

explicitMods:
Area contains Metamorph Monsters
Metamorph Bosses which drop an Itemised Sample drop an additional Itemised Sample
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As you explore the vast well of human darkness, Saresh, our Surgeon of the Dead,
remember that the price can sometimes exceed the value of knowledge.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
90% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Egrin of the Dark Between Stars, Forger of the Sealing Blade,
let your name be redeemed by your unexpected sacrifice.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains 3 additional Red Beasts
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Order was your clan in life, Agnar, Beastmaster, but the First Ones call
back their favoured son. The gift of their Visions will pass to another.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Abyss
Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your golems and your leadership have slowed the tide of death, Clayshaper.
The relics of power you bid us find have kept the Vastiri Plains from the brink
of oblivion. The defences of the Maraketh will hold.

explicitMods: Area is haunted by 5 additional Tormented Spirits
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your tortured soul long kept you isolated from your peers, Tsarsk, but has attracted
new kindred in kind. You are tasked with appeasing these anguished spirits.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Legion Encounter
Each Legion contains a War Hoard
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As our hand in the Chamber, we grant you, Deacon Eutychus,
access to a domain we lack the resources to explore.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
60% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Speaker of unclean truths, Egrin of the Dark Between Stars.
We curse you whose soul echoes the madness of the void!

explicitMods: Area contains 3 additional Harbingers
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For deciphering the language of the inscrutable ones, honoured Sarina,
we charge you with investigating their intent in our land.

explicitMods:
Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Map Area
60% more Rare Shaper Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Bold dreamer, Qianga of the Stars, she of the Celestial Cold! These titles
we bestow upon the one among us whose soul speaks to the ineffable.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create Esh's Breachstone.

explicitMods:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 40% more Sulphite
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For harnessing and controlling the power of lightning, you, Raethan,
are now charged with researching this new energy.

explicitMods:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 20% more Sulphite
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As the first Brinerot to join the Order, you have much to prove,
young Raethan. We are confident you will succeed.

explicitMods:
Area contains Einhar
Area contains an additional Red Beast
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Feuding Ezomytes slaughtered your kin, young Agnar, but we pulled you
from the flames. The Order of the Djinn is your clan now.

explicitMods: Area contains an additional Breach
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Ember-dwellers sought to throw you to their volcanic god, young Omid,
but we caught you instead. The Order of the Djinn is your tribe now.

explicitMods: Area contains an additional Expedition Encounter
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your people no longer walk this continent, young Revna,
but the Order of the Djinn will give you a new home.

explicitMods: 50% more Unique Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Maraketh left you to die alone in the desert, young Sumei, but we
saw the potential in you. The Order of the Djinn is your akhara now.

explicitMods: 20% increased Maps found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Consider yourself an orphaned Eternal no longer, young Betucia.
The Order of the Djinn is your family now.

explicitMods: Area contains a Blight Encounter
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: We pulled you from the raging ocean, young Dhunan,
but we cannot return you to your home. The Order of the Djinn
offers you a place on Wraeclast.

explicitMods: Area contains an additional Abyss
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As the hordes of bone and blood and foul magic surge across the Vastiri Plains,
the scant survivors of our akhara agree to your alliance, ash-scarred Ahkeli.
Disorder means death. Order may mean life.

explicitMods: Area contains 2 additional Harbingers
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your ancestry has been much maligned by history, young Sarina Titucius,
but to the Order of the Djinn, you are born anew.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Expedition Encounter
Area contains 50% increased number of Runic Monster Markers
20% increased number of Explosives
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: We lay you to rest in the forest deep, Runesmith Revna, so that you may be
forever hidden from the stars which so terrified you in your final days.
May the secret you took to your grave be lifted from your burdens.

explicitMods: 150% more Divination Cards found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your centuries of service have been invaluable to us, Narumoa. Go now,
return to Hinekora, and join your ancient kin in the halls of the dead.

explicitMods:
Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Map Area
30% more Rare Shaper Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Peak-dwellers saw you as impure, young Qianga, but the Order of
the Djinn sees you as all the stronger for your uniqueness.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Breach
Breaches in Area contain an additional Breach Boss' Clasped Hand
Breach Hands in Area drop double Breach Splinters
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Omid, Master Researcher, has left a final commandment upon his death:
the world must never know.

items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Maraketh Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create Xoph's Breachstone.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Eternal Emblem.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Webs are torn, not untangled.

items.descrText: Combine 100 splinters to create Chayula's Breachstone.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The light without pales in comparison to the light within.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Only those who aspire can dare to hope.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Templar Emblem.
Travel to the Aspirants' Plaza and spend this item to open the Eternal Labyrinth.
flavourText: It is time for the Goddess to give her final verdict.
Your fate rests in her even hands.

explicitMods:
Unique Boss deals 10% increased Damage
Unique Boss has 10% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Unique Boss has 10% increased Life
Unique Boss has 20% increased Area of Effect
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device, allowing you to capture the Soul of the Map's Boss. The Vessel containing the captured Soul can be retrieved from the Map Device. You must be in the Map when the boss is defeated.
flavourText: Power is a curious thing.
It can be contained, hidden, locked away,
and yet it always breaks free.

items.descrText: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Karui Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Timeless Vaal Emblem.
Combine 100 Splinters to create Tul's Breachstone.
Combine 100 Splinters to create Uul-Netol's Breachstone.
Combine 100 Splinters to create a Ritual Vessel.
Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us from the darkness.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Abyss
Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters
Abysses in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths lead to a Stygian Spire
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: The Winter of the World has ended at the hands of the Three Sisters. We lay this scarab
upon your ancient grave in thanks for your efforts, Honoured Founder. As you hoped,
the fate of your people will never befall another.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us into the light.

explicitMods: 50% more Divination Cards found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: You were a casualty of callous Karui warfare, ageless Narumoa, but the Order
mended your wounds. You are bound to us now by your own code.

explicitMods:
Adds Elder Influence outcome to Map Area
30% more Rare Elder Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your visions led the Azmeri down into a world left abandoned by the Vaal.
They cast you out, young Egrin, but the Order of the Djinn accepts you.

items.descrText: Combine 10 Crescent Splinters to create The Maven's Writ.
flavourText: Precious and perilous,
Tantalising and terrible.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.

explicitMods: Area contains 4 additional Strongboxes
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Your people were renegades, Rindwik, but you have proven your loyalty.
You will lead the martial defence of our expeditions.

explicitMods: 100% more Unique Items found in Area
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As the best of our lorekeepers, honoured Sumei, it is now your task
to investigate the mysterious duplication of artefacts of power.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Fear drives survival.

items.descrText: Open a portal to Absence of Mercy and Empathy by using this item in a personal Map Device. Can only be used once.
flavourText: It would be foolish to obey the Maven's demands.
It would also be foolish not to.

explicitMods: Area contains 5 additional Strongboxes
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Master Warrior Rindwik fell to one opponent alone: old age.
Only the greatest soldiers can say as much.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: He sought a kingdom,
but lost his people.

explicitMods: Area contains 4 additional Harbingers
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: For your valour beyond the Gate, Sarina Titucius, we honour you with the first
Gilded Scarab awarded while its recipient still lives. Remain vigilant.

items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Legion Encounter
Each Legion contains a War Hoard
Each Legion is accompanied by a General
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Given the fate of Deacon Eutychus and the men under Cardinal Sanctus Vox,
let none dare the Domain, lest they too feed that vile hunger eternal.

explicitMods: Area is haunted by 7 additional Tormented Spirits
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Though you were swallowed by your own darkness, you saved countless others
from eternal misery, young Tsarsk. You were not nothing, as you feared.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Understanding leads to mastery.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Beauty is in the eye of the creator.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Expedition Encounter
Area contains 25% increased number of Runic Monster Markers
20% increased number of Explosives
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: As you delve into the mysteries of this world, apprentice Revna,
remember to learn from the past, not be consumed by it.

explicitMods:
Area contains an additional Breach
Breaches in Area contain an additional Breach Boss' Clasped Hand
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: We task you, honoured Omid, with the investigation of this mysterious
'Xoph' and artefacts related to rifts in the boundaries of our world.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The Vaal shall never fear the setting of our sun.

explicitMods:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 60% more Sulphite
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Let him not be called Raethan the Betrayer. His discovery was too important
to keep locked away. Now, for good or ill, it is in civilisation's hands.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: He sought to be the best,
but lost his family.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: When we prostrate ourselves to the night, we worship mortality.

items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: Enter the crucible. The nexus of
nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

implicitMods: Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped
items.descrText: Open portals to The Maven's Crucible by using this item in a personal Map Device.
